meanings.definition: To remove ions from a solution.
meanings.sent1: She is deionising the water to make it pure.
meanings.sent2: The scientist deionises the solution to study its properties.
meanings.sent3: The machine kept deionising the liquid until it sparkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The deionising process stripped the solution of all its charged particles.
meanings.sent5: After deionising, the solution was as clean as a whistle.

meanings.definition: The process of removing ions from a solution.
meanings.sent1: The deionising of the solution was crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Deionising is essential in water treatment plants.
meanings.sent3: The deionising machine hummed softly as it worked its magic.
meanings.sent4: The deionising process turned the murky liquid into a clear solution.
meanings.sent5: The deionising of the solution made it safe for consumption.
